00038 #define ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK       "ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK"

00044 #define ACQ200_MAXTO "ACQ200_MAXTO"

00046 #define ACQ200_WRITEFILE "ACQ200_WRITEFILE"

00055 #define _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE

00069 #define BUFLEN  0x400000        /* @@todo read from device */
00070 #define TIMEOUT 50              /* @@todo ticks. should be msec. */
00071 
00072                                 /*         but that needs dvr chg. */
00073 
00074 #define INITIAL_TIMEOUT (24*3600*100)
00075 
00076 #define REVID "$Revision: 1.11 $ B1000"
00077 
00078 
00079 int SLOT = 3;
00080 int acq200_debug = 0;
00081 int timeout = TIMEOUT;
00082 int MAXTO = 60;                 /* max timeout retries */
00083 int SLEEP_WORK = 0;
00084 
00085 struct DeviceMapping {
00086         int fd;
00087         void *pbuf;
00088         char id[8];
00089 };
00090 
00091 struct FILE_INFO {
00092         char format[128];
00093         char fname[128];
00094         unsigned maxfile;
00095         unsigned nfiles;
00096         int ifile;
00097         int fd;
00098         int oneshot;
00099 }
00100         G_file = {
00101                 /* default limits: 2GB * 10000 = 10T */
00102                 .maxfile = 0x80000000U,
00103                 .nfiles = 10000,
00104                 .fd = -1
00105         };
00106 
00107 static struct DeviceMapping bufAB[2] = {
00108         [BUFFERA] = {
00109                 .id = "bufA"
00110         },
00111         [BUFFERB] = {
00112                 .id = "bufB"
00113         }
00114 };
00115 
00116 
00117 static void initMapping(struct DeviceMapping *mapping, int slot)
00118 {
00119         char fname[128];
00120 
00121         sprintf(fname, "/dev/acq200/acq200.%d.%s", slot, mapping->id);
00122 
00123         mapping->fd = open(fname, O_RDWR);
00124         if (mapping->fd < 0){
00125                 err("failed to open %s ", fname);
00126                 perror("open");
00127                 exit(errno);
00128         }
00129 
00130         mapping->pbuf = mmap(0, BUFLEN, 
00131                                 PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, 
00132                                 MAP_PRIVATE|MAP_NONBLOCK, 
00133                                 mapping->fd, 0);
00134 
00135         if (mapping->pbuf == MAP_FAILED){
00136                 err("mmap() failed");
00137                 perror("mmap");
00138                 exit(errno);
00139         }
00140 }
00141 
00142 static void checkWork(int index, int len)
00143 {
00144         FILE *fp = popen("md5sum", "w");
00145 
00146         dbg(1, "index %d len %d", index, len);
00147         fwrite(bufAB[index].pbuf, 1, len, fp);
00148 
00149         pclose(fp);
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00153 
00154 static void fileOpen(int len)
00155 {
00156         char fname[128];
00157         if (G_file.fd != -1 ){
00158                 off_t fp = lseek(G_file.fd, 0, SEEK_CUR);
00159                 if (fp + len < G_file.maxfile){
00160                         return;
00161                 }else{
00162                         close(G_file.fd);
00163                 }
00164         }
00165 
00166         sprintf(G_file.fname, G_file.format, G_file.ifile);
00167         G_file.fd = open(G_file.fname, 
00168                                 O_WRONLY|O_CREAT|O_TRUNC|O_LARGEFILE, S_IRWXU);
00169         
00170         if (G_file.fd <= 0){
00171                 perror("failed to open file");
00172                 err("FATAL open failed:%s", fname);
00173                 exit(-1);
00174         }
00175 
00176         if (++G_file.ifile > G_file.nfiles){
00177                 if (G_file.oneshot){
00178                         exit(0);
00179                 }
00180                 G_file.ifile = 0;
00181         }
00182 }
00183 
00184 static void fileWork(int index, int len)
00185 {
00186         dbg(2, "%s: index %d len %d", G_file.fname, index, len);
00187         fileOpen(len);
00188         write(G_file.fd, bufAB[index].pbuf, len);
00189 }
00190 
00191 static void defaultWork(int index, int len)
00192 {
00193         
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 static void sleepWork(int index, int len)
00198 {
00199         dbg(1, "%d", SLEEP_WORK);
00200         usleep(SLEEP_WORK);
00201 }
00202 
00203 void (* doWork)(int index, int len) = defaultWork;
00204 
00205 static int action() {
00206         struct BufferAB_Ops ops = {
00207                 .ci.timeout = INITIAL_TIMEOUT
00208         };
00209         int next = BUFFERA;
00210         char status[80];
00211         unsigned long long total = 0;
00212         int syscalls = 1;
00213         int timeouts = 0;
00214 #define FD bufAB[BUFFERA].fd
00215         int started = 0;
00216 
00217 
00218         dbg(1, "timeout %d", ops.ci.timeout);
00219 
00220         initMapping(bufAB+0, SLOT);
00221         initMapping(bufAB+1, SLOT);
00222 
00223 
00224         for(; 1; syscalls++, ops.ci.timeout = timeout){
00225                 int rc = ioctl(FD, ACQ200_BUFFER_AB_IOWR, &ops);
00226                 char *sp = status;
00227 #define SPRINTF(fmt, arg...) do { sp += sprintf(sp, fmt, ##arg); } while(0)
00228 
00229                 if (rc >= 0){
00230                         if (acq200_debug && timeouts != 0){
00231                                 SPRINTF("\n");                          
00232                         }
00233                         timeouts = 0;
00234                         started = 1;
00235                 }else if (rc == -1 && errno == ETIMEDOUT){
00236                         if (acq200_debug){
00237                                 fputc('.', stderr); fflush(stderr);
00238                         }
00239                         if (started && ++timeouts >= MAXTO){
00240                                 perror("TIMEOUT?");
00241                                 return rc;
00242                         }else{
00243                                 sleep(1);
00244                                 continue;
00245                         }
00246                 }else{
00247                         perror("errno?");
00248                         err("ioctl(ACQ200_BUFFER_AB_IOWR) %d errno %d ET %d",
00249                                                 rc, errno, ETIMEDOUT);
00250 //                      return rc;
00251                         continue;
00252                 }
00253                 
00254                 ops.ci.recycle = 0;
00255 
00256                 SPRINTF("%8d:", syscalls);
00257                 if (ops.ds.full&BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next]){
00258                         total += ops.ds.len[next];
00259                         SPRINTF("N:%d %8d %8d :", next, 
00260                                         ops.ds.sid[next], ops.ds.len[next]);
00261                         ops.ci.recycle |= BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next];
00262 
00263                         doWork(next, ops.ds.len[next]);
00264 
00265                         next = !next;
00266 
00267                         if (ops.ds.full&BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next]){
00268                                 total += ops.ds.len[next];
00269                                 SPRINTF("..");
00270                                 SPRINTF("N:%d %8d %8d :", next, 
00271                                         ops.ds.sid[next], ops.ds.len[next]);
00272                                 ops.ci.recycle |= BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next];
00273                                 doWork(next, ops.ds.len[next]);
00274 
00275 
00276                                 next = !next;
00277                         }
00278                 }
00279                 dbg(1, "%s", status);
00280 
00281                 if (ops.ds.full&FULL_EOF){
00282                         break;
00283                 }
00284         }
00285 
00286         fprintf(stderr, "Total bytes: %Lu\n", total);
00287 
00288         return 0;
00289 }
00290 
00291 
00292 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00293 {       
00294         if (getenv(ACQ200_DEBUG)){
00295                 acq200_debug = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_DEBUG));
00296         }
00297         if (getenv(ACQ200_CHECKWORK)){
00298                 doWork = checkWork;
00299         }
00300         if (getenv(ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK)){
00301                 SLEEP_WORK= MAX(atoi(getenv(ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK)), 1);
00302                 doWork = sleepWork;
00303         }
00304         if (getenv(ACQ200_TIMEOUT)){
00305                 timeout = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_TIMEOUT));
00306         }
00307         if (getenv(ACQ200_SLOT)){
00308                 SLOT = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_SLOT));
00309         }
00310         if (getenv(ACQ200_MAXTO)){
00311                 MAXTO = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_MAXTO));
00312         }
00313         if (getenv(ACQ200_WRITEFILE)){
00314                 strcpy(G_file.format, getenv(ACQ200_WRITEFILE));
00315                 if (strstr(G_file.format, "%") == 0){
00316                         strcat(G_file.format, ".%03d");
00317                 }
00318                 if (getenv(ACQ200_MAXFILE)){
00319                         G_file.maxfile = strtoul(getenv(ACQ200_MAXFILE),0,0);
00320                 }               
00321                 if (getenv(ACQ200_NFILES)){
00322                         G_file.nfiles = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_NFILES));
00323                 }
00324                 if (getenv(ACQ200_ONESHOT)){
00325                         G_file.oneshot = atoi(getenv(ACQ200_ONESHOT));
00326                 }
00327                 doWork = fileWork;
00328         }
00329 
00330         info("htstream %s slot %d", REVID, SLOT);
00331 
00332         return action();
00333 }
